section.title: LINKINFO_PROPS
section.para: This is an additional UNIT which gives extra information about linking.

section.title: static_name_def
section.programlisting: assexp: EXP POINTER x id: TDFSTRING(k, n) -> LINKINFO
section.para: assexp will be an obtain_tag construction which refers to a TAG which is defined with make_id_tagdef, make_var_tagdef or common_tagdef. This TAG will not be linked to an EXTERNAL.
The name id shall be used (but not exported, i.e. static) to identify the definition for subsequent linking.

para.replaceable: This construction is likely to be needed for profiling, so that useful names appear for statically defined objects. It may also be needed when C++ is translated into C, in order to identify global initialisers.

section.title: make_comment
section.para: n shall be incorporated into the object file as a comment, if this facility exists. Otherwise the construct is ignored.

section.title: make_weak_defn
section.programlisting: namer: EXP POINTER x val: EXP POINTER y -> LINKINFO
section.para: namer and val will be obtain_tag constructions which refer to TAGs which are defined with make_id_tagdef, make_var_tagdef or common_tagdef. They shall be made synonymous.

section.title: make_weak_symbol
section.programlisting: id: TDFSTRING(k, n) val: EXP POINTER x -> LINKINFO
section.para: val will be an obtain_tag construction which refers to a TAG which is defined with make_id_tagdef, make_var_tagdef or common_tagdef.
This TAG shall be made weak (in the same sense as in the SVID ABI Symbol Table), and id shall be synonymous with it.
